duties_responsibilities.duty: Ensure excellence in guest satisfaction through a committed and hands-on management style.
Utilize leadership skills and motivate employees to ensure cost control and labor management.
Inspect establishment and observe workers and guests to ensure compliance with standards and regulations.
Ensure accuracy of paperwork such as daily sales reports, petty cash forms, and payroll records.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Hospitality Management or related field (Master's preferred)
